name: Fruity Duet
desc: A dual-flavored fruity beverage. Add a thick layer of pulp at the bottom and then pour in a smoothie made out of juice and tea. Its layered flavors of fresh fruit are so tempting that no one is able to refuse the drink.

customize.name: Recipe: Fruity Duet
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fruity Duet.

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Jam
customize.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

customize.name: Qingxin
customize.desc: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Delicious Fruity Duet
customize.desc: A dual-flavored fruity beverage. A small sip sends you to a beach paradise, the fragrance of fruit dancing upon your lips as you lie upon the white sands, watching the orange sun slowly rising, warming your heart and lifting your spirits.

customize.name: Suspicious Fruity Duet
customize.desc: A dual-flavored fruity beverage. The pulp at the bottom tastes just as bitter as drinking it makes you feel... How about making another cup to dispel that bitterness from your mouth and heart?

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
